CreateAnomalyMonitor.name: CreateAnomalyMonitor
CreateAnomalyMonitor.description: Grants permission to create a new Anomaly Monitor

CreateAnomalySubscription.name: CreateAnomalySubscription
CreateAnomalySubscription.description: Grants permission to create a new Anomaly Subscription

CreateCostCategoryDefinition.name: CreateCostCategoryDefinition
CreateCostCategoryDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a new Cost Category with the requested name and rules

CreateNotificationSubscription.name: CreateNotificationSubscription
CreateNotificationSubscription.description: Grants permission to create Reservation expiration alerts

CreateReport.name: CreateReport
CreateReport.description: Grants permission to create Cost Explorer Reports

DeleteAnomalyMonitor.name: DeleteAnomalyMonitor
DeleteAnomalyMonitor.description: Grants permission to delete an Anomaly Monitor

DeleteAnomalySubscription.name: DeleteAnomalySubscription
DeleteAnomalySubscription.description: Grants permission to delete an Anomaly Subscription

DeleteCostCategoryDefinition.name: DeleteCostCategoryDefinition
DeleteCostCategoryDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a Cost Category

DeleteNotificationSubscription.name: DeleteNotificationSubscription
DeleteNotificationSubscription.description: Grants permission to delete Reservation expiration alerts

DeleteReport.name: DeleteReport
DeleteReport.description: Grants permission to delete Cost Explorer Reports

DescribeCostCategoryDefinition.name: DescribeCostCategoryDefinition
DescribeCostCategoryDefinition.description:
Grants permission to retrieve descriptions such as the name, ARN, rules, definition,
                                                and effective dates of a Cost Category

DescribeNotificationSubscription.name: DescribeNotificationSubscription
DescribeNotificationSubscription.description: Grants permission to view Reservation expiration alerts

DescribeReport.name: DescribeReport
DescribeReport.description: Grants permission to view Cost Explorer Reports page

GetAnomalyMonitors.name: GetAnomalyMonitors
GetAnomalyMonitors.description: Grants permission to query Anomaly Monitors

GetAnomalySubscriptions.name: GetAnomalySubscriptions
GetAnomalySubscriptions.description: Grants permission to query Anomaly Subscriptions

GetCostAndUsage.name: GetCostAndUsage
GetCostAndUsage.description: Grants permission to retrieve the cost and usage metrics for your account

GetCostAndUsageWithResources.name: GetCostAndUsageWithResources
GetCostAndUsageWithResources.description: Grants permission to retrieve the cost and usage metrics with resources for your account

GetCostForecast.name: GetCostForecast
GetCostForecast.description: Grants permission to retrieve a cost forecast for a forecast time period

GetDimensionValues.name: GetDimensionValues
GetDimensionValues.description:
Grants permission to retrieve all available filter values for a filter for a period
                                                of time

GetPreferences.name: GetPreferences
GetPreferences.description: Grants permission to view Cost Explorer Preferences page

GetReservationCoverage.name: GetReservationCoverage
GetReservationCoverage.description: Grants permission to retrieve the reservation coverage for your account

GetReservationPurchaseRecommendation.name: GetReservationPurchaseRecommendation
GetReservationPurchaseRecommendation.description: Grants permission to retrieve the reservation recommendations for your account

GetReservationUtilization.name: GetReservationUtilization
GetReservationUtilization.description: Grants permission to retrieve the reservation utilization for your account

GetRightsizingRecommendation.name: GetRightsizingRecommendation
GetRightsizingRecommendation.description: Grants permission to retrieve the rightsizing recommendations for your account

GetSavingsPlansCoverage.name: GetSavingsPlansCoverage
GetSavingsPlansCoverage.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans coverage for your account

GetSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendation.name: GetSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendation
GetSavingsPlansPurchaseRecommendation.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans recommendations for your account

GetSavingsPlansUtilization.name: GetSavingsPlansUtilization
GetSavingsPlansUtilization.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans utilization for your account

GetSavingsPlansUtilizationDetails.name: GetSavingsPlansUtilizationDetails
GetSavingsPlansUtilizationDetails.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Savings Plans utilization details for your account

GetTags.name: GetTags
GetTags.description: Grants permission to query tags for a specified time period

GetUsageForecast.name: GetUsageForecast
GetUsageForecast.description: Grants permission to retrieve a usage forecast for a forecast time period

ListCostCategoryDefinitions.name: ListCostCategoryDefinitions
ListCostCategoryDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve names, ARN, and effective dates for all Cost Categories

ProvideAnomalyFeedback.name: ProvideAnomalyFeedback
ProvideAnomalyFeedback.description: Grants permission to provide feedback on detected anomalies

UpdateAnomalyMonitor.name: UpdateAnomalyMonitor
UpdateAnomalyMonitor.description: Grants permission to update an existing Anomaly Monitor

UpdateAnomalySubscription.name: UpdateAnomalySubscription
UpdateAnomalySubscription.description: Grants permission to update an existing Anomaly Subscription

UpdateCostCategoryDefinition.name: UpdateCostCategoryDefinition
UpdateCostCategoryDefinition.description: Grants permission to update an existing Cost Category

UpdateNotificationSubscription.name: UpdateNotificationSubscription
UpdateNotificationSubscription.description: Grants permission to update Reservation expiration alerts

UpdatePreferences.name: UpdatePreferences
UpdatePreferences.description: Grants permission to edit Cost Explorer Preferences page

UpdateReport.name: UpdateReport
UpdateReport.description: Grants permission to update Cost Explorer Reports
